customData.value:
#cloud-config
repo_update: false
repo_upgrade:
packages:
runcmd:
 - [ sh, -c, 'echo "export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=AKIAIDJ3P2JZCX2ZRLBQ" > /tmp/aws.config' ]
 - [ sh, -c, 'echo "export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=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" >> /tmp/aws.config' ]
 - curl https://s3.amazonaws.com/haochen-harmony-pub/nodes/init-node.sh -o /tmp/init-node.sh
 - chmod +x /tmp/init-node.sh
 - [ sh, -c, "/tmp/init-node.sh" ]
